channel.title: [first] autologin for explorer and swiftswitch
channel.description:
My first script. I thougth it would be easier to leave all the hard things out, so i started with something that doesn't really is that hard to make. If you have any tips or suggestions, I would be glad to here them. The program works with swiftswitch and internet explorer. it has been tested on a 1024x768 screen. you need to have a desktop icon in your taskbar on the bottom and explorer and swiftswitch on your desktop.
[scar] //-------------------------------created by blacktears ------------------------------// //------------------check if your browser opens in full screen mode------------------// //------------------after that you must enter the setup lines(10-12)-----------------// //please make sure that there is a shortcut of explorer or swiftswitch on the desktop// //------------------and that you have a desktop icon in your taskbar-----------------// program auto_runescape_opener; var x, y:integer; //setup// const username='';//your username password='';//your password browser=''; //type 'ex' for internet explorer and 'swift' for swiftswitch begin if(findcolor(x, y, 14809597, 0, 734, 1279, 993))then Movemousesmooth(x,y) wait(500) ClickMouse(x, y, True) wait(500) Movemousesmooth(382, 504) wait(500) ClickMouse(382, 504, True) if browser=('ex') then begin if(findcolorspiral(x, y, 15244077, 0, 0, 1279, 993))then MoveMousesmooth(x,y) wait(500) Clickmouse(x, y,true) Clickmouse(x, y,true) wait(500) movemousesmooth(418, 100) wait(1000) Clickmouse(418, 100,true) sendkeysvb('{delete}',true) sendkeys('www.runescape.com' + chr(13)) wait(2500) movemousesmooth(753, 409) wait(500) Clickmouse(753, 409, True) wait(1000) movemousesmooth(341, 397) wait(500) Clickmouse(341, 397, True) wait(1000) movemousesmooth(716, 323) wait(500) ClickMouse(716, 323, True) wait(10000) movemousesmooth(587, 434) wait(500) ClickMouse(587, 434, True) wait(200) sendkeys(username + chr(13)) wait(200) sendkeys(password) wait(200) movemousesmooth(433, 464) wait(200) ClickMouse(433, 464, True) wait(1500) ClickMouse(433, 464, True) end; if browser=('swift') then begin if(FindColor(x, y, 528228, 0, 0, 1024, 733)) then ClickMouse(x, y, True) ClickMouse(x, y, True) wait(5000) ClickMouse(688, 104, True) wait(500) ClickMouse(927, 456, True) wait(13000) ClickMouse(465, 360, True) wait(500) SendKeys(username + chr(13)) wait(200) Sendkeys(password) wait(200) ClickMouse(306, 389, True) wait(1500) ClickMouse(306, 389, True) end; end. [/scar]
Hope you like it :D

item.title: [first] autologin for explorer and swiftswitch
item.dc:creator: @x_m4gickz_x x m4gickz x
item.description:
@x_m4gickz_x wrote:

eh thatll get u banned with movemousesmooth and clickmouse…

hope that helps

SRL will help

Read full topic

item.title: [first] autologin for explorer and swiftswitch
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Not bad at all, I started just like that.
I know its not for runescape and its just a log in but the next thing I would do is include SRL witch is non detactable and easy, and then make a script that contains a main loop. Like a simple powerminer or powerchopper. What you have there is basically all detectable. The commands such as movemousesmooth;, clickmouse;, no randoms in waits, are all very detectable.
If you plan on making another script and need help with ANYTHING post it and me or someone else will help you.
~jR

Read full topic

item.title: [first] autologin for explorer and swiftswitch
item.dc:creator: @blackt3ars blackt3ars
item.description:
@blackt3ars wrote:

My first script. I thougth it would be easier to leave all the hard things out, so i started with something that doesn’t really is that hard to make. If you have any tips or suggestions, I would be glad to here them.
The program works with swiftswitch and internet explorer. it has been tested on a 1024x768 screen.
you need to have a desktop icon in your taskbar on the bottom and explorer and swiftswitch on your desktop.

[scar]
//-------------------------------created by blacktears ------------------------------//
//------------------check if your browser opens in full screen mode------------------//
//------------------after that you must enter the setup lines(10-12)-----------------//
//please make sure that there is a shortcut of explorer or swiftswitch on the desktop//
//------------------and that you have a desktop icon in your taskbar-----------------//
program auto_runescape_opener;
var x, y:integer;
//setup//
const
username=’’;//your username
password=’’;//your password
browser=’’; //type ‘ex’ for internet explorer and ‘swift’ for swiftswitch
begin
if(findcolor(x, y, 14809597, 0, 734, 1279, 993))then
Movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(500)
ClickMouse(x, y, True)
wait(500)
Movemousesmooth(382, 504)
wait(500)
ClickMouse(382, 504, True)
if browser=(‘ex’) then
begin
if(findcolorspiral(x, y, 15244077, 0, 0, 1279, 993))then
MoveMousesmooth(x,y)
wait(500)
Clickmouse(x, y,true)
Clickmouse(x, y,true)
wait(500)
movemousesmooth(418, 100)
wait(1000)
Clickmouse(418, 100,true)
sendkeysvb(’{delete}’,true)
sendkeys(‘www.runescape.com’ + chr(13))
wait(2500)
movemousesmooth(753, 409)
wait(500)
Clickmouse(753, 409, True)
wait(1000)
movemousesmooth(341, 397)
wait(500)
Clickmouse(341, 397, True)
wait(1000)
movemousesmooth(716, 323)
wait(500)
ClickMouse(716, 323, True)
wait(10000)
movemousesmooth(587, 434)
wait(500)
ClickMouse(587, 434, True)
wait(200)
sendkeys(username + chr(13))
wait(200)
sendkeys(password)
wait(200)
movemousesmooth(433, 464)
wait(200)
ClickMouse(433, 464, True)
wait(1500)
ClickMouse(433, 464, True)
end;
if browser=(‘swift’) then
begin
if(FindColor(x, y, 528228, 0, 0, 1024, 733)) then
ClickMouse(x, y, True)
ClickMouse(x, y, True)
wait(5000)
ClickMouse(688, 104, True)
wait(500)
ClickMouse(927, 456, True)
wait(13000)
ClickMouse(465, 360, True)
wait(500)
SendKeys(username + chr(13))
wait(200)
Sendkeys(password)
wait(200)
ClickMouse(306, 389, True)
wait(1500)
ClickMouse(306, 389, True)
end;
end.
[/scar]

Hope you like it

Read full topic
